EditTextPreference.android:title: My Player Names...
EditTextPreference.android:summary: After loading a game the chessboard will be rotated to show the game from that players perspective.\nEnter one name per line.

ListPreference.android:title: Orientation in Study Mode...
ListPreference.android:summary: Select initial orientation of the board in the study mode

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Cruise Mode
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If enabled, "next" acts as "next game" in the end of variation

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Cruise in Study Mode
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If enabled, in the study mode making a move in the end of variation goes to the next game

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Next Game is Random
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If enabled, the next game is chosen randomly

EditTextPreference.android:title: Study first move delay
EditTextPreference.android:summary: If non-zero, then in study mode the computer waits so many seconds after the next game is loaded and do a move

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Report thinking time
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Report the time it takes you to make the correct move in study mode

EditTextPreference.android:title: Auto play interval
EditTextPreference.android:summary: If non-zero, then a long click on next move button starts autoplay with this interval in seconds

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Make game favorite on wrong move
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If enabled, then once you guess a wrong move in study mode, the game is marked as favorite

ListPreference.android:title: Move List
ListPreference.android:summary: Display all moves or current move only

ListPreference.android:title: Text Size
ListPreference.android:summary: Font size for move list and game information
